nodes.bodyText: This needs to be kept, unless we want to stop distribute it in core. We could start by changing it to runtimeOnly (or just remove it, but we should quick check that we are not breaking known add-ons).

I guess we have to keep it for now, it seems used by:

ascanrules
ascanrulesBeta
fuzz
pscanrules
sse
websocket


commonlib is already on collections4
    implementation("org.apache.commons:commons-collections4:4.4")
We should not introduce it as api, it does not seem to be needed though.
